title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Cloud WAN MCP Server: Transform network operations with GenAI (NET331)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Cloud WAN MCP 服务器：利用生成式 AI 转变网络运营 (NET331)
abstract: Ready to experience the power of debugging network issues through natural language queries? Discover how AWS Cloud WAN's Model Context Protocol (MCP) server leverages Generative AI to redefine network operations. In this session, learn how to use common, complex scenarios including trace network paths using natural language queries, analyzing AWS Cloud WAN Core Network policies through simple prompts, and troubleshoot global routing with AI-assisted intelligent analysis. Perfect for network professionals who want to explore streamlining their AWS infrastructure management while embracing the future of AI-powered networking tools.
abstract_cn: 准备好体验通过自然语言查询调试网络问题的强大功能了吗？了解 AWS Cloud WAN 的模型上下文协议 (MCP) 服务器如何利用生成式 AI 重新定义网络运维。在本次会议中，学习如何使用常见的复杂场景，包括使用自然语言查询跟踪网络路径、通过简单提示分析 AWS Cloud WAN 核心网络策略，以及借助 AI 辅助智能分析排查全球路由故障。非常适合希望简化 AWS 基础设施管理同时拥抱 AI 驱动网络工具未来的网络专业人士。
